name: Gify AI
description: Gify AI is an avant-garde platform operating on the Ethereum blockchain, integrating the sophistication of AI, the security of blockchain technology, and the user-friendly interface of Telegram bots. Our mission is to revolutionize digital interactions and gifting, fostering joy and connectivity across the global community. Gify AI enables users to send digital gifts, engage in peer-to-peer betting, and access DALL-E image generation, all powered by our proprietary token, $GIFY.
